modName: URCENBP - Ultra Realistic Colorful ENB Preset
summary: My second enb preset I hope you like it :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/73hq7.jpg[/img][/center]







[size=4][center][b][i]Hello everybody and thanks that you spend time to look at my enb preset :)[/i][/b][/center][/size]







This is my [b]second[/b] enb preset so I´m not a profi.
But nevertheless I will do my best.
If you like this enb preset endorse it that I know that my work is good.
Please note that I´m not a profi so feedback is greatly appreciated.


IMPORTANT: This archive don´t include the d3d9.dll because its illegal so you have to download it here>>[url=http://www.enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]Official ENB page[/url]


[size=4][b]Now the new version 1.01 with some improvements is out![/b][/size]



[b][i]This enb preset is available in the following versions:[/i][/b]

>> very low (no SSAO/SSIL, no DoF, no detailed shadows, no adaption, no sun rays, no bloom)

>> low ( with bloom, sun rays, detailed shadows, effects quality= 2)

>> normal (all options on except complex indirect lighting, effects quality= 1)

>> medium (all options on, effects quality= 1)

>> high (all options on, effects quality= 0)

>> very high (all options on, effects quality= -1)


[b][i]IMPORTANT: The very high preset is only for very fast highend computers!!![/i][/b]









Now that we are talking about important things if you haven´t done open your [b]SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] and change the following values:



[b]bTreesReceiveShadows=0[/b]<<[b]to[/b]>>[b]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/b]

[b]bDrawLandShadows=0[/b]<<[b]to[/b]>>[b]bDrawLandShadows=1[/b]

[b]bFloatPointRenderTarget=0[/b]<<[b]to[/b]>>[b]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/b]






[b][i][u]known issues[/u][/i][/b]

- fog in the menu is much to bright and ugly (fixed in version 1.01)
- the environment at night is much to bright (fixed in version 1.01)






Credits goes to:

Tapioks for his nice enbpalette which was my fundamental for my own enbpalette thanks man!
>>[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=822]Skyrim Enhanced Shaders FX - ENB[/url]

Matso for his nice DoF effect thanks man!
>>[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5587]Skyrim Visual Immersion[/url]

Boris Vorontsov the great man who have created this nice project called ENB series huge thanks to him!
>>[url=http://enbdev.com/index_en.html]Official ENB page[/url]
author: GaMeR94
